import React from 'react' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import Rating from '../components/Rating' import products from '../product' const ProductScreen = ({match}) => { const product = products.find((p) => p._id == match.params.id) return(
Go Back

{product.name}

Price: ${product.price}

{product.description}

Price:
) } export default ProductScreen
